description: Bot to check tables for Title and Description

sf.aa_query: SELECT TOP 25 t.ID AS table_id, t.name, t.DS_ID, t.TITLE AS TITLE, t.DESCRIPTION AS DESCRIPTION, p.popularity FROM public.rdbms_tables t LEFT JOIN public.popularity p ON t.table_id = p.object_id AND p.object_type = 'table' WHERE t.DELETED = FALSE AND LENGTH(TRIM(t.TITLE)) = 0 AND LENGTH(TRIM(t.DESCRIPTION)) = 0 AND t.DS_ID != 1 AND p.popularity IS NOT NULL AND t.DS_ID != 1 ORDER BY p.popularity DESC;
sf.last_etl: SELECT last_load_time from information_schema.load_history where table_name = 'STG_RDBMS_TABLES' ORDER BY last_load_time DESC LIMIT 1
